channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Your Favorites by Request
channel.desc: Host Tim Parton and guest Yvonne Lewis-Shelton sing favorites, new and old, about the blessings people have in Christ and the peace that he brings, even if life is seemingly going all wrong.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Jesus 4 Asia Now
channel.desc: Missionary family, the Nortons, are lead of God to establish a home to care for children in Thailand that come from broken homes.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Child Impact International
channel.desc: The future of Twing Memorial School in Tanzania looks hopeful with support from Child Impact donors.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Miracles in Motion
channel.desc: Hershell finds his way to the Lord later in life; raised in Oklahoma and moving schools frequently, he begins his spiritual journey at age 70, finding solace in Pastor Murray's sermons at Shepherd's Chapel.
